DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate safety pharmacokinetics RG7667 healthy volunteer . Subjects randomize cohort receive either single/multiple dos RG7667 intravenously placebo . Anticipated time study treatment 57 day 12-week follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Male female subject , 18 55 year age , inclusive Body mass index 18.0 31.0 kg/m2 , inclusive In good health , determine clinically significant finding medical history , 12lead ECG , vital sign , laboratory value , deem Investigator History malignancy , except completely excise basal cell carcinoma squamous cell carcinoma skin cervical carcinoma situ History severe bacterial , fungal , parasitic infection ( 2 hospitalization within 1 year 2 course iv antibiotic within 1 year ) Pregnant , lactating , plan pregnancy within 6 month Screening Positive hepatitis B , hepatitis C HIV infection Exposure investigational biological agent within 90 day prior Screening evaluation receive investigational treatment 30 day prior Screening evaluation ( within 5 halflives investigational agent , whichever great ) History alcoholism drug addiction within 1 year Screening Positive urine test select drug abuse Screening Checkin ( Day 1 ) ; positive breathalyzer test alcohol Checkin Use prescription drug within 14 day prior Day 1 study , except hormonal contraceptive hormone replacement therapy Use overthecounter ( OTC ) medication within 7 day prior Day 1 study . Medications acetaminophen ibuprofen routinelytaken dietary supplement , include vitamin herbal supplement allow discretion investigator Sponsor . Donation plasma within 7 day prior Day 1 . Donation loss blood 50 mL 499 mL blood within 30 day , 499 mL within 56 day prior Day 1 . Lack peripheral venous access
